title: Pakistanis, Kashmiris to raise effective voice against India on August 5: Mushaal
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 3 (APP):Chairperson Peace & Culture Organisation, Human Rights Activist Mushaal Hussein Mullick on Saturday said that on August 5, Pakistani and Kashmiri people living all over the world should come out to give the strapping message and raise effective voices against Indian tyranny.
In a video message, she said that the Pakistani government was not only supporting the Kashmir indigenous freedom movement but with Kashmiris imprisoned in Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu Kashmir (IIOJK).
Mushaal Mullick said that on August 5, 2019, India robbed the rights of Kashmiri people. She urged the international community and human rights organizations to pressure India to stop the Kashmiri genocide.
She said that India was making efforts to hang Yasin Malik, who was detained illegally in imprisonment.
